jobDescription: As an intern in SBM Offshore, you’ll be part of the Digital FPSO project. You’ll work closely with project team members and others Digital FPSO project stakeholders to understand data and turn it into critical information and knowledge that can be used to improve the operations.  Your job will be focusing on the analysis of time series data coming from our vessels. You’ll be expected to build new algorithms and improve the current ones to improve safety and efficiency as well as life expectancy of different assets all around the ships.  Data Science is a rapidly growing domain in our company and your knowledge and expertise will be valued.  Education and Experience: Currently pursuing Masters Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science or related field.Machine Learning / Deep Learning experience.Experience with time series analysis is a plus.Autonomy Technical skills :Experience with machine learning programming skills in Python (Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-learn)Strong analytical and problem solving skillsExperience at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets.Be a creative thinker and be able to propose innovative ways to look at problems.
